product_name: Columbia Road 2 Peak Full-Zip Fleece Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Versatile and soft, the Columbia Road 2 Peak Full-Zip fleece jacket features breathable, quick-drying and non-pilling polyester fleece for warmth without a lot of weight. Stretch fleece panels ensure the jacket moves with you. Omni-Shield(R) advanced repellency resists stains and light precipitation. Zippered handwarmer pockets; drawcord hem. Closeout.
short_description: Versatile and soft, the Columbia Road 2 Peak Full-Zip fleece jacket features breathable, quick-drying and non-pilling polyester fleece for warmth without a lot of weight.
